  • Classes in org.opendaylight.controller.sal.authorization used by org.opendaylight.controller.appauth 
    Class and Description
    IResourceAuthorization
    Interface for applications which maintain an authorization database for their resources.
  • Classes in org.opendaylight.controller.sal.authorization used by org.opendaylight.controller.appauth.authorization 
    Class and Description
    AppRoleLevel
    Represents the application user role levels This level has meaning only inside the application context In the controller space such a role will be seen as APPUSER as specified in UserLevel
    IResourceAuthorization
    Interface for applications which maintain an authorization database for their resources.
    Privilege
    It represents the group/resource access privilege
    Resource
    It represents the elementary resource along with the access privilege associated to it
    ResourceGroup
    Represents a group of resources along with the privilege associated to it
    UserLevel
    Describes the user role level in the controller space
